properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens. Should be a strong, randomly generated string.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 86400000 (24 hours).

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: app.partnership.recipient-email
properties.description: Email address to receive partnership requests.
